text: nissandeh safa aur marava allaah kee vishesh nishaaniyon mein se hain; atah jo is ghar (kaaba) ka haj ya umapa kare, usake lie isamen koee dosh nahin ki vah in donon (pahaadiyon) ke beech phera lagae. aur jo koee svechchha aur ruchi se koee bhalaee ka kaary kare to allaah bhee gunagraahak, sarvagy hai
